name: Ceipal
description: Ceipal is a scalable, AI-driven, total talent acquisition platform that provides visibility across all channels and sources while organizing your data into a single talent ecosystem. With the power of advanced automation and artificial intelligence, Ceipal’s industry leading ATS and CRM solutions empower recruiters and staffing professionals to efficiently identify, assess, engage, hire, and onboard the best talent.
Headline: Welcome to the new frontier of talent acquisition

Highlights.name: Applicant Tracking System
Highlights.description: Global ATS with matching, ranking, sourcing and harvesting

Highlights.name: Procurewise VMS
Highlights.description: VMS to procure & manage contingent staff, direct workers & SOW vendors

Highlights.name: Workforce Management
Highlights.description: HRMS for customized onboarding & intelligent employee management

enhanced_description: Ceipal is a scalable, AI-driven, total talent acquisition platform designed for staffing organizations, internal and corporate recruiting teams, managed service providers, and systems integrator organizations. It offers end-to-end visibility across all talent channels and sources, consolidating data into a single talent ecosystem. Leveraging advanced automation and artificial intelligence, Ceipal provides industry-leading ATS and CRM solutions that empower recruiters and staffing professionals to efficiently identify, assess, engage, hire, and onboard top talent. Key capabilities include a global Applicant Tracking System with matching, ranking, sourcing, and harvesting features, a Procurewise VMS for procuring and managing contingent staff, direct workers, and SOW vendors, and a Workforce Management module functioning as an HRMS for customized onboarding and intelligent employee management, along with support for pre-employment screening and testing.
key_use_cases: Managing contingent workforce, direct workers, and SOW vendors via VMS
competitive_advantages: Unified data across diverse talent channels and sources
Combines ATS, CRM, VMS, and HRMS functionalities in one suite
Global ATS with advanced matching, ranking, sourcing, and harvesting
Ability to manage both permanent and contingent workforce within the same platform
Focus on improving hiring speed and recruiting efficiency
roi_benefits: Enhanced visibility across all talent channels
Centralized talent data for better decision-making
Optimized management of contingent and direct workers
